description: Your concern for damaging foe hinders you.
You pull your punch.
Mishandle strike. Try again.
Foe's guard comes up and blocks your assault.
Awkward positioning spoils your strike.
Move in close. You gain the initiative next round.
Strike to foe's chest. He is having some trouble.
Stike falls on foe's leg. He shakes it off.
Blow lightly strikes foe's head. He puts you at bay with a masterful turn.
Backhand to foe's side. He steps 5 feet to the right, avoiding your reach.
Classic shot between foe's shoulder blades. He hurts.
Chest strike is solid. Knock the wind out of your foe. He struggles to evade.
Side strike damages a muscle. Foe is disabled for the moment.
Blow to foe's shield arm. If foe has a shield, it should check for breakage.
Strong grip and a shot to the side make for an effective combination. Foe is disabled for an instant.
Your attack is part grapple and sweep. You push foe off balance.
Strike lands solid upon foe's neck. His neck is sprained. He falls down and has difficulty getting up.
Solid strike turns foe's head and it pinches a nerve in his neck. Foe falls over and goes unconscious.
You pop foe on his head in what looks like a playful strike. He pauses 1 round, then passes out.
Your attempt is poorly planned.
You're being too delicate. Bust him!
Your strike lands on foe's shoulder. Attack is of little profit.
You attempt to kick foe in groin. You miss, but the threat is enough.
You miss foe's head and strike his shoulder. He is unbalanced.
Blow lands on foe's shield hand.You gain the initiative.
Back strike. Your position is better. Foe seeks to keep you at bay.
Your strike was less than you hoped. It still disorients your foe.
Shoulder strike lands lightly. You put more shove into it than strike. Foe is frantic to regain his balance.
Hard blow to foe's side. He is weakened by the pain. He doubles over in response to the assault.
Grab foe's weapon arm and force it the wrong way. Foe is disarmed. Elbow is strained.
Strong forearm assault drives foe back off his footing. He slips down to one knee.
You try to kick foe off his feet. The strike lands on foe's calf. Deep bruise.
Heavy handed attack. It looks like you're going for a kill. Foe avoids the worst. Blow to foe's shield arm.
Side strike knocks foe down. He pulls you over with him. You fail to pummel him into submission. You have a great position.
Hard strike to the back of foe's neck terminates foe's conscious thoughts. He drops. Foe's shoulder blade is bruised.
Your knuckles go into foe's temples and cause a painful overload to foe's brain. He falls gripping his head for 2 rounds and passes out.
Fracture foe's skull with a lucky strike. Foe falls unconscious. The swelling will kill him in 2 hours.
Strong blow to foe's back knocks him down and paralyzes him. Serious nerve damage. Foe is unconscious.
Your concern for foe is heart warming.
You will need to make a fist.
Blow to foe's chest. If foe is 2 feet tall or shorter, he is unconscious.
Side strike unbalances foe. He will recover quickly.
Chest strike. He almost falls, but foe grabs you for balance. Ooops!
You entangle foe's legs, but he breaks free. You push him clear.
Lower back strike sends foe reeling. He needs another shot to the kidneys.
Hammer foe's thigh. Pain is in his eyes. Bruise muscles.
Good strike. Foe has trouble getting his act together. He stumbles around for some time trying to defend himself.
You grip foe's arm and shake it until he drops his weapon. Foe kicks himself free. At least you disarmed him.
Bring foe down to his knees and slam his head down. He is virtually unconscious. He is yours. Finish him.
Strong blow to foe's chest breaks ribs. Your attack has little grace. Foe looks to be devastated.
You assault foe's foot. He is unable to stand on it.
Strike to foe's arm causes him to fall with a fracture. You punch at his head for added effect.
Strong blow to foe's side. Foe drops his weapon to react to the pain. You move to block him from its recovery. Foe gives ground with little concern.
Strong blow to foe's back knocks him off his feet. Foe lands hard and is knocked out by the impact. You have him now.
Overwhelming blow knocks foe down. He fumbles his weapon and hits hard trying to recover it. Foe goes unconscious on impact.
Blow lands on foe's forehead. His head snaps back and he loses consciousnes. He then drops hard on the ground and hits his head.
Severe chest strike. Foe falls, breaking his arm and hitting his head. He goes into a coma for 2 weeks.
Nothing graceful about this attack. Foe does not even flinch.
Pow! Right in the kisser.
Blow to foe's chest. If foe is 3 feet tall or shorter, he is unconscious.
Blow to foe's side sends him reeling. He recovers and gets his guard up.
You trip foe and slam his shin. Simple, yet effective.
Step on foe's foot and try to push him over. You gain the initiative next round.
Back strike adds insult to the injury. Foe spins around to face you.
Chest strike causes deep bruise. Foe grabs at the pain in his chest.
Hard blow to foe's thigh. Foe falls down, but rebounds to his feet. You had hoped he would stay down.
Catch foe in the middle of a swing. He drops his weapon and grips his arm. His forearm has a huge bruise.
Solid strike to foe's head. The strike is enough to knock foe out. He falls down and out for 6 hours.
Smash foe's shoulder, breaking it. Arm is useless. Foe struggles to stand. The pain is too much for him.
Leg strike causes foe to fall and fracture his leg.
Strong blow to foe's weapon arm disarms him and causes him to fall. He lands hard and breaks a rib.
Strike to foe's side sends him to the ground. While falling, he fractures his ankle. Foe goes unconscious from the pain.
Blow to foe's back knocks him to the ground. His weapon slides across the floor. He hit very hard. Foe goes unconscious for 5 rounds.
Grip foe's arm and hold it, while striking him in the face until he goes unconscious. Foe is unconscious for 15 rounds.
Strong blow to the abdomen causes foe to fall to the ground. He hits his head. Foe goes into a coma for 1 month.
Pummel foe's head. He falls unconscious in a nice spot on the ground.
Strike to neck pinches a nerve. What did you do to him? Foe is unconscious.
You simply hit foe in the face.
Boom! Crash! Pow! Crack! It looked impressive.
Strike to foe's side. Cheap shot, executed with grace.
Foe leaves himself open. Your strike hits his side and breaks some ribs.
You experiment with a knee strike to foe. It fails to be very effective.
Hard shot to foe's side causes a pain generated panic. His guard is down.
Chest wound knocks foe down. He lands on his back.. He looks to be recovering.
Solid and strong, you bash foe in his stomach. He recoils 10 feet from you. He keeps his footing.
Solid and effective, your blow lands on foe's neck. A nerve is pinched. Foe falls unconscious for 3 hours.
Brutal, but effective shot to foe's face. His head snaps back and then flops forward. He falls unconscious.
You attack lands unexpectedly on foe's shoulder. It is fractured. Foe drops his guard in response to the pain.
Strike to foe's thigh causes him to fall. Blow creates a terrible bruise.
Fierce blow to foe's weapon arm disarms him and sends him sprawling. You have his weapon.
Side strike knocks foe down. You hit him in the face as he falls. In the fall, he breaks his leg.
Nasty blow to face. Foe is knocked down. Foe's lips curl up in a ball and froth comes out of his mouth. You are frightened. Foe goes unconscious.
Strike to shoulder breaks the collar bone. Foe knocks himself out with a graceless fall. You strike his head to make sure.
Your haste to get the advantage makes your attack deadly. You snap foe's neck. Foe falls and dies in 15 rounds.
Textbook subdual. You strike foe on his head. He settles to the ground in a silent move. He is unconscious for 10 hours.
